text: Adam McKay (born April 17, 1968) is an American actor, director, writer and comedian. Born in Pennsylvania, he directed and wrote several movies and won the Academy Award for Best Adapted Screenplay in The Big Short. == References == Category:Living people Category:1968 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American movie directors Category:Comedians from Philadelphia Category:Actors from Philadelphia
title: Adam McKay
